creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
there were reports that the html serialization sometimes leaves namespaces in,
which leads to invalid output and may break javascript and other functionality.
this can be fixed by using util/strip_namespaces.xsl

it may make sense to wrap the html serializer to always do this step, and use
call-resource or map:transform instead of the html serializer directly.
*** Bug 26820 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: gregor@apache.org
